location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.262 of 1852, from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government Bombay

mods.abstract: Kemball informs Malet that the two female slaves rescued from Bahrain, and first alluded to in his letter of 19 April 1852 (ff 244-46), are on their way to Bombay. Enclosed with the letter is a statement of expenses incurred towards the maintenance of two slaves during their stay at the Residency in Bushire.
